comprehensive_overview: r-base64 is an R package that provides functions for encoding and decoding base64 data in R language. Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that converts binary data into ASCII strings using a set of 64 printable characters.
core_features: Encode binary data into base64 format
Decode base64 strings back to binary data
Support for efficient and secure data encoding and decoding
Integration with R environment for seamless data manipulation
